properties.name: Pella
properties.key1: Birthplace of Alexander the Great and capital of ancient Greek Kingdom of Macedon

properties.name: Troy
properties.key1: The first Asian city reached by Alexander
properties.key2: Alexander sacrificed to Athena and poured a libation to the heroes here

properties.name: Alexandria
properties.key1: Founded by Alexander and named after him
properties.key2: Became a prosperous city and was famous for Lighthouse of Alexandria

properties.name: Persepolis
properties.key1: Capital of Alexander's biggest rival, Achaemenid Empire (Ancient Persia)
properties.key2: Looted and burned by Alexander's troops

properties.name: Taxila
properties.key1: The first Indian city reached by Alexander
properties.key2: Greek culture strongly impacted local people's life-styles
